PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
  MODULE status_0100.																																
  MODULE clear_okcode.																																
  MODULE trans_data.																																
  MODULE modify_screen.																																
  MODULE set_icon.																																
																																
  MODULE SET_SUBSCREEN.																																
																																
  CALL SUBSCREEN SUB																																
    INCLUDING SY-CPROG GV_DYNNR.																																
																																
																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
  MODULE exit AT EXIT-COMMAND.																																
  CHAIN.																																
    FIELD: sdyn_conn-carrid,																																
           sdyn_conn-connid.																																
    MODULE get_data ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
  ENDCHAIN.																																
																																
  FIELD sdyn_conn-airpfrom																																
    MODULE check_airpfrom ON REQUEST.																																
																																
  CALL SUBSCREEN SUB.																																
																																
																																
																																
																																
  MODULE user_command_0100.
